location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 110; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. A previous foliation sequence between ff 82-109, which is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence from the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, titled Arabia Series: printed letters for 1935 Nos 59-70; 1936 Nos 1-12, 13-36. 36A-50, 51-93; 1937 Nos 1-35, 36-59, 65-70; 1938 Nos 1-31. The printed letters include summaries from Arabic newspapers Berid Barca, Alef Ba, Adel.The file features the following principal correspondents: the Political Agent and Consul, Muscat; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf.
